mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.theme AS "theme", a.content AS "content", a.files AS "files", a.read_mark AS "readMark", a.time AS "time", a.sender_id AS "senderId", a.receiver_id AS "receiverId", a.cc_id AS "ccId", a.own_id AS "ownId", a.state AS "state", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.flag AS "flag"
mapper.select: SELECT a.*,s.name FROM mail_info a,sys_user s WHERE a.id = #{id} and s.id=a.sender_id

SELECT s.*,o.name as officeName FROM sys_user s,sys_office o where s.office_id=o.id
and s.company_id=#{companyId}
AND s.login_name like '%'||#{loginName}||'%' '%'+#{loginName}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{loginName}, '%')
AND s.name like '%'||#{name}||'%' '%'+#{name}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
and s.del_flag='0'
SELECT * FROM sys_user s where s.id=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mail_info( id, theme, content, files, read_mark, time, sender_id, receiver_id, cc_id, own_id, state, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{theme}, #{content}, #{files}, #{readMark}, #{time}, #{senderId}, #{receiverId}, #{ccId}, #{ownId}, #{state}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{flag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE mail_info SET theme = #{theme}, content = #{content}, files = #{files}, read_mark = #{readMark}, time = #{time}, sender_id = #{senderId}, receiver_id = #{receiverId}, cc_id = #{ccId}, own_id = #{ownId}, state = #{state}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, flag=#{flag} WHERE id = #{id}
